name: The Necro-Nom-icon
description:
Follow the recipe-like instructions of the Necro-Nom-icon and perform rituals to make contact with the Ancient Ones. Will it provide the answers you have been looking for? A reason for those odd dreams? Or will you succumb to madness first?

This is just some weird  game idea made for the HawkZombie's 3rd Annual Game Jam.

Features

  • Short game of around 10-15 mins
  • Complete rituals to make Lovecraftian horror-themed dishes.
  • A secret 'RPG Maker' Easter egg.

 Just barely finished in time so let's hope it's not too broken!
